item.title: Episode 1 - Tue Oct 28 2025
item.description: Top Transportation and Logistics Stories for Tue Oct 28 2025 Here are the links for the stories: 1. https://www.ttnews.com/articles/ups-stuns-wall-street-strong-profit-and-34000-job-cuts 2. https://www.ttnews.com/articles/delhaize-usa-open-860m-east-coast-distribution-center 3. https://www.ttnews.com/articles/uber-invest-hong-kong-listings-pony-ai-weride 4. https://www.ttnews.com/articles/atas-spear-hails-rollback-ev-mandates-other-trucking-wins 5. https://www.ttnews.com/articles/amazon-lay-30000-cost-pressures-mount
